allow: Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File run.ps1 mix run -e "VoskEx.set_log_level(0); IO.puts(""SUCCESS!"")")
Bash(powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File run.ps1 mix run -e "VoskEx.set_log_level(0); IO.puts(""SUCCESS!"")")
Bash(powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File run.ps1 mix run -e "VoskEx.set_log_level(0); IO.puts(""SUCCESS - NIF LOADED!"")")
